traits.name: Mental Resistance
traits.desc: The broodguard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't paralyze it.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.
